title: Clinical Practical Competency Enhancement: Flipped Learning-Based Interactive Problem-Posing Strategy Workshop

context.prior_knowledge: Basic flipped learning experience and foundational understanding of language education principles
context.additional_context: Practical competency enhancement program for medical/nursing field practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can explain core concepts with over 80% accuracy before class using digital resources in a flipped learning environment.
Learners can generate three or more creative questions during collaborative learning with peers by applying interactive problem-posing strategies.
Learners can develop two or more language problem-solving scenarios applicable to real job contexts through project-based assessments.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
